## MessageHandler class

Agent plugin that provides [IMessageHandler](./daf-core.imessagehandler.md) methods

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class MessageHandler implements IAgentPlugin
```

<b>Implements:</b> [IAgentPlugin](./daf-core.iagentplugin.md)
